comments: helicopter responded to the area of 3530 Truxel RD for reports of a stolen car in the area
Helicopter responded to the area of Folsom Blvd and Margaret Ln for an officer fighting with someone.  That person was detained.
Helicopter responded to the area of 6710 Folsom Blvd for reports of a person brandishing a knife.  Subject was unable to be located by officers
Helicopter responded to the area of Dnieper River Way and Bombili St to search the area for a missing person.   Missing person was located
Helicopter responded to the area of Power Inn Rd and 38th Ave for reports of an assault using a car.
Helicopter responded to the area of La Riviera Dr and Lido Cir for reports of a subject with a knife.  Units were unable to locate the subject.
Helicopter responding to the area of 25th st and x st for reports of subjects with guns.
helicopter responding to the area of cosumnes river blvd and franklin blvd for reports of a side show

Los Gatos Cir/Havenside Dr - Responded out to assist ground units search for a missing person. The missing person is a 14-year-old African American female with pink braids on the left side of her hair. She was last seen wearing a black zip-up hooded jackets, pink tank top, black Nike shorts with the Nike logo, and carrying a large blue and pink backpack.
Air unit assisting officers with a burglary in progress
Air unit was assisting ground units with a felony stop of a stolen vehicle
Sac PD Air Unit assisted ground units in checking the area of Fruitridge RD & Freeport BLVD, for a report of a suspicious subject.
Sac PD Air Unit assisted Sac County Sheriff with a suicidal subject in the area of 44th ST & Sierra Vista Ave
Broadway/62nd St - Responded out to assist ground units search for armed subject. Subject was found.
Sac County Air Unit assisted ground units with checking the area of Terracina DR and Truxel RD for a vehicle.
Sac County Air Unit assisted ground units for a call for backup from Highway Patrol in the area of Arden Way and Heritage LN
Sac County Air Unit received a LOJACK activation in the area of Danbrook DR and Crest DR.
Sac PD Air unit assisted ground units with a possible burglary in the area of El Camino and Van Ness ST.
FAL30 is assisting ground units in a priority call in the area of  El Camino Ave and Del Paso Blvd
CHP Helicopter in the area of SCHREINER ST / 69TH AVE to assist ground units with searching for a subject.

Helicopter responded to the area of 47th Ave and Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd to assist ground units on a suspicious subject running from the police.
Helicopter responded to the area of Fair Oaks Blvd and Howe Ave for reports of a physical assault in progress.  Ground unit located both involved parties
Helicopter responded to the area of Freeport Blvd and Meer Way for a silent robbery alarm to a business.  Alarm was accidentally set off by employees.
